bibl.title: Multi-Spectral Imaging vs. Monospectral Infrared Imaging.
bibl.note: Monospectral infrared imaging is the most practical solution. However, multi-spectral imaging provides considerably more data. - Multi-Spectral Imaging (MSI) - MSI vs. Monospectral Infrared Imaging. - Imaging of Ostraca. - Recent Image Processing Developments. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: BAY Stephen, Gregory BEARMAN, Roger MACFARLANE and Thomas WAYMENT, Multi-Spectral Imaging vs. Monospectral Infrared Imaging.

Monospectral infrared imaging is the most practical solution. However, multi-spectral imaging provides considerably more data. - Multi-Spectral Imaging (MSI) - MSI vs. Monospectral Infrared Imaging. - Imaging of Ostraca. - Recent Image Processing Developments. - Conclusion.
